markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[One-Toed Hop](/Feats.aspx?ID=1317) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Assuming a peculiar stance, you make a short hop on each toe. You make a vertical [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) without triggering reactions that can be triggered by [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) actions or upon leaving or entering a square.
name: One-Toed Hop
